Summary: 3 firery rings in a triangle descended to the treeline from nowhere, shot quickly across them and suddenly dropped in to the trees.
divs: Sighting Details3 firery rings in a triangle descended to the treeline from nowhere, shot quickly across them and suddenly dropped in to the trees. It moved in L shaped movements. This was near fort custer military reserve. It moved unlike any aircraft I had seen before. I thought it might be a "harrier" or an experimental craft. It looked a lot like the depiction in the Belgian sightings, that is why I bothered let you know. This was a long time ago, so I might have the year wrong, but I remember it was really late, and in the late fall. I was riding in the back seat of my friend's car on the 94 freeway. It appeared right in my line of sight over the tree line; it was bright. I thought it was a UFO, but figured out over time it could have been a "Harrier" Jet. It was 3 firery rings and moved with more "snap" than a chopper. Very fast, and it moved in L-shaped movements. I asked my friend if she saw it, and she said no. It fell under the tree line when I lost sight of it. (it must have landed)
trends: There have been no other sightings in Climax
This sighting has never been favorited.
